data.name: CurlyTemplate
data.value: Remember to replace items enclosed in curly braces with what you want

data.name: HelpText
data.value:
This utility provides ability to receive notifications about changes in state of monitored web pages (in other words – about updates and news) in form of system messages.
The context menu invoked by right-clicking on the application icon in system tray allows you to manage and build notifications, view them in main window, as well as request information about the application and go to monitored pages.
In addition, the utility automatically requests new records with specified update rate and, if available, displays the appropriate notifications

data.name: KeywordNotSpecified
data.value: Search keyword is missing in “Beginning” field

data.name: NotEnoughDataMessage
data.value: One of required fields is empty, or link to website is specified incorrectly

data.name: NotMatchingNames
data.value: Notification with the same name already added

data.name: SearchFailure
data.value: Link to webpage is incorrect or keyword is not found on this page

data.name: Tip_00
data.value:
Welcome to UniNotifier! Here you can configure the news service and notifications themselves. Some buttons and fields contain useful tips that will be shown once.
Detailed instructions for setting up the service are available on YouTube button in app info window)

data.name: Tip_01
data.value: This button allows you to apply changes performed on the right side of window to the currently selected notification

data.name: Tip_02
data.value: This button allows you to add new notification with settings presented on the right side of window

data.name: Tip_03
data.value: This button allows you to remove selected notification

data.name: Tip_04
data.value: This button allows you to load settings from notification template

data.name: Tip_05
data.value: This button allows you to automatically find delimiters for the new notification (see user manual for details)

data.name: Tip_06
data.value: This section allows you to select the notification, the source of which will be opened in browser

data.name: Tip_07
data.value: This field allows you to select notification for configuring

data.name: Tip_08
data.value: When you'll close this window, the background service will start and begin monitoring. When you call settings interface again, the service will be paused for its correct configuration

data.name: Tip_09
data.value: In some cases, the needed part of web page is not the first on it, which is limited by the specified markers. This field allows you to specify which occurrence of the target area (from the top of page) should be displayed

data.name: NoTemplateInClipboard
data.value: No compatible notification templates found in the clipboard. Copy template string to clipboard and try again

data.name: Tip_10
data.value: This button allows you to share settings of the current notification (copy them to clipboard)

data.name: Tip_11
data.value: This button allows you to load shared settings from clipboard

data.name: WizardFailure
data.value: It looks like this site is not supported in UniNotifier. Try using a different keyword

data.name: WizardStep1
data.value:
Welcome to the notifications wizard!
This function will help you to create a notification that UniNotifier can automatically poll.
First, enter a link (URL) to the site from which you want to receive notifications

data.name: WizardStep2
data.value:
Now enter a keyword.
This word (or phrase) should be present right now in that part of the site that will change over time, which will be the source of text for notifications. The ideal would be a phrase that is present now only in this area or is first encountered on the site in it. The case of letters doesn't matter

data.name: WizardStep3
data.value: For the specified settings, the text below is received. If it meets your expectations, click OK to add the notification. Otherwise, click Retry and we’ll try again

data.name: WizardStep4
data.value: For the specified settings, the text below is received. If it meets your expectations, click OK to add the notification. Otherwise, retry the action and try a different keyword

data.name: WizardStep5
data.value: It’s ready! Now specify the name of notification to be displayed in the main log

data.name: SettingsForm_ComparatorFlag
data.value: Check the first number in text and show warnings if it is

data.name: SettingsForm_WindowCallFlag
data.value: Show main window on urgent notifications

data.name: Tip_12
data.value:
This function allows you to set a numerical threshold. It will be compared with the first number in every obtained text using the specified comparison method. If the new text matches the condition, app will display a special warning.
It is also possible to display a notification only if this condition is met
